reviews.review_msg: Jeremie is not a great teacher. He does give you chances to redeem yourself with some work, but he makes things way harder than they should be and picks students he believes are better than others

Very hard marker in regard to essay writing. Make sure to always cite, even when you don't think you should...you will learn the hard way. Personality makes you not want to participate in class, makes you feel inferior. Wouldn't take this prof again, sometimes you have no choice though! Make sure to do your readings for the quizzes.
Jérémie is a real one! Can be stern but overall was a great prof! Great fits and very detailed explanation. Also an environmentalist so he gets extra points in my books.

Never wants to listen to what students have to say, if you're on the other side of his opinion. Always out to get people for their quality of French and similarities to other online sources (he'll yell at you in his office is there's even a similarity to another source). Beware taking his classes.
